template.content: WHEREAS the parties wish to explore [Purpose] and in connection therewith, it may be necessary for the parties to disclose certain confidential and proprietary information to each other;

template.content: For purposes of this Agreement, 'Confidential Information' shall mean any and all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by either party to the other, whether orally, in writing, or in any other form.

template.heading: 2. OBLIGATIONS OF RECEIVING PARTY
3. EXCEPTIONS
4. RETURN OF INFORMATION
template.content: Upon termination of discussions or upon request, the Receiving Party shall return or destroy all documents and materials containing Confidential Information.

template.content: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of [Duration] years from the date hereof, unless terminated earlier by mutual consent.

template.heading: 6. REMEDIES
template.content: The Receiving Party acknowledges that any breach of this Agreement may cause irreparable harm to the Disclosing Party and agrees that the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief.

template.content: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of India and any disputes shall be subject to the jurisdiction of courts at [JurisdictionPlace].
